Life Lock - Who'll Make Noise Not Music?!! demo 2011
Who'll Make Noise Not Music?!! demo 2011
Life Lock - Who'll Make Noise Not Music?!! demo 2011

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on March 19, 2012 Description from Terminal Escape:
Their influences are worn on their sleeve (or in this case, on the bottom of the jacket, under the studs) - brilliant DIS-worship from Singapore's LIFE LOCK. It's Monday, and the guitars are stabbing into your eyes...just how you like it.  WHO'LL MAKE NOISE NOT MUSIC?!! Full Force Hardcore Destruction
